Chapter Title: BRITISH AUTOBIOGRAPHIES Book Title: British Autobiographies Book Subtitle: An Annotated Bibliography of British Autobiographies Published or Written before 1951 Book Editor(s): WILLIAM MATTHEWS Published by: University of California Press Stable URL: https://www.jstor.org/stable/jj.2430770.3
JSTOR is a not-for-profit service that helps scholars, researchers, and students discover, use, and build upon a wide range of content in a trusted digital archive. We use information technology and tools to increase productivity and facilitate new forms of scholarship. For more information about JSTOR, please contact support@jstor.org.
